name: 黃聲東
objective: 本課程屬於生物技術的基礎課程，授課內容強調基本生化原理，介紹細胞組成份〈包括核酸、蛋白質、醣類和脂質〉的化學、生物活性及代謝，並分別闡明代謝作用與基因表現的調節機轉，輔以現今生化尖端學術研究的介紹，希望能以一學期的緊密課程，讓學生瞭解現代生化科技領域的輪廓，作為日後深造或從事生化科技行業的奠基。
schedule:
Weeks	Dates	Content
1	       9/12, 9/13	Introduction; Chapter 3 From Genes to Protein
2	       9/19, 9/20	Chapter 3 From Genes to Protein
3	       9/26, 9/27	Chapter 4 Protein Structure
4	      10/3, 10/4	Chapter 5 Protein Function, mid-autumn holiday
5	      10/10, 10/11Chapter 6 How Enzymes Work
6	      10/17, 10/18Chapter 7 Enzyme Kinetics and Inhibition
7	      10/24, 10/25Chapter 8 Lipids and Membranes 
8	     10/31,          Exam I (Chapter 3 and 7)
              11/1	        Chapter 9 Membrane Transport
9	     11/7, 11/8	Chapter 10 Signaling
10	    11/14, 11/15	Chapter 11 Carbohydrates
11	     11/21, 11/22	Chapter 12 Metabolism and Bioenergetics
12	     11/28, 11/29	Chapter 13 Glucose Metabolism
13	     12/5, 	         Exam II (Chapter 9-13) 
             12/6              Chapter 14 The Citric Acid Cycle
14	     12/12, 12/13	Chapter 15 Oxidative Phosphorylation
15	    12/19, 12/20	Chapter 17 Lipid Metabolism
16	     12/26, 12/27	Chapter 18 Nitrogen Metabolism 
                                 Chapter 19 Regulation of Mammalian Fuel Metabolism
17	    1/2, 1/3	Exam III (Chapter 14, 15, 17, 18, 19)
18	    1/14, 1/15
scorePolicy:
所有考試題目都是英文出題，可使用翻譯機
Exam I (30%); Exam II (30%); Exam III (30%); Attendance (10 %) 
及格分數為60分 
考試未出席且未請假，分數為0分計算。
考試請假只有1次機會且不補考，成績由其他2次考試分數平均計算
materials:
本學期教科書為﹕Biochemistry, 8th Edition 
                               Biological Chemistry 8th edition
作者：M.K Campbell and S.O. Farrell.
出版社：CENGAGE
